mapper.select: /* cgGroupCategory.getAllGroupCategory */ SELECT CATEGORY.UID AS CATEGORY_UID ,CATEGORY.CATEGORY_CD ,CATEGORY.CATEGORY_NM ,CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP ,CASE WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'INCOME' THEN '수입 카테고리' WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'EXPEND' THEN '지출 카테고리' WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'SAVINGS' THEN '저축/투자 카테고리' END AS CATEGORY_TP_NM ,CASE WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'INCOME' THEN true WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'EXPEND' THEN false WHEN CATEGORY.CATEGORY_TP = 'SAVINGS' THEN false END AS CATEGORY_TP_IS_ADD FROM CASH_GUARD.CG_GROUP_CATEGORY CGG INNER JOIN CASH_GUARD.CG_CATEGORY CATEGORY ON CATEGORY.UID = CGG.CATEGORY_UID WHERE CGG.GROUP_UID = #{groupUid}
